title: Smog - NO produced early and quickly oxidized

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the pattern in NO concentration?

choices.label: NO is a secondary pollutant with a long residence time in the atmosphere.
NO does not play a significant role in smog formation.
NO is formed in the lower atmosphere in the morning by the rising Sun.
NO is produced by rush-hour traffic and is quickly oxidized in the atmosphere.
NO is quickly absorbed by plants and converted to sugars.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
